channel.title: Half Life Origins - By the Beyond Black Mesa creators
channel.description:
Infectious Designer, the team behind the short Beyond Black Mesa (which was more or less Half Life related) have released a new Half Life short, called [b]Half Life Origins[/b]
It shows the beginning of Half Life 1.
Have fun:
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=Zw684xM2cUo[/url]
I like the visual style of it and the soundtrack is very good too.

item.title: Half Life Origins - By the Beyond Black Mesa creators
item.dc:creator: RedShirt
item.description:
Dias:

I could ask you the same. :retard:
Better yet; why would Black Mesa allow their competition to tour their research facility? It’s just a reference for the sake of a reference with little thought put into it.

Maybe a failed attempt at collaboration? Dr. Breen rambled on quite a bit about collaboration in one of his BreenCasts.

Whatever, not canon anyway. Just a funny little inside reference for those who pay attention to Portal and HL.

Read full topic
item.source: Half Life Origins - By the Beyond Black Mesa creators

item.title: Half Life Origins - By the Beyond Black Mesa creators
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Dias:

You’re a bit tardy to the party.

I still cannot get over how all valve fan-films have less substance than any given movie trailer, yet still get heaps of praise for just being shiny.

people are hungry for HL content. Any fanfilm no matter how shit is considered a milestone. Not saying I agree with it, but that’s just how it is.

Read full topic

pretentious cocksucker factory

this

xalener:

He’s not a troll, he’s just an asshole.

this

Dias:

It’s not about the difference, it’s about the similarity. Why’d you take the time to respond to it in the first place?

just stop being a stupid cunt. you’re annoying everyone. enough where i had to use effort typing this and inform you about it.

Anyway, yeah there’s another thread already on this video that was posted before awhile back, but i must say. i just watched it as a recap and i still cannot get over how fucking epic this shit is, despite it’s length. MOAARRRR
